resources.string: Shoe store consists of all the shoes listed. You can find each shoe with its name, company, size and description.

A button on Shoe List screen takes to Shoe Details Screen. One can add more shoes into the list. In the Shoe Details screen fill all the details of a particulat shoe. Once added the show will be shown in the list on the list screen.
We\'re pleased to see you around here.\nContinuing you are agreeing to the terms of use and privacy policy
Takes to shoe details screen to add new shoe
